itemizedlist.listitem: Caller send in asyncronous way a loan application data
Process invoke the syncronous Credit rating service
If SSN is not a number or zero the Credit rating service generates a fault, otherwise send a positive 100 as a rating
process must be able to handle fault and set the rating as a -1000
process do a two asyncronous invokation of two different loan services in a paralel flow
process must be able to receive from both services the loan approval messages
The Star loan service in case of negative credit rating must return greater APR than United loan service
process must choose the best offer (lower APR) and make asyncronous invoke to the caller's endpoint
Invokation of loan services must be done using WS-RM protocol, using same rules as for RMEcho test
